title: Taroko (1988) Genesis Portion
description: Seediq, also known as Sediq, Taroko, is an Atayalic language spoken in the mountains of Northern Taiwan by the Seediq and Taroko people.

language.name: Taroko
language.area: Central, east, and coast; mountains north, Puli area; coast south of Hualien, south of the Atayal [tay].
